channel.title: "From each according to his ability, to each according to his need"
channel.description:
Resolution: "From each according to his ability, to each according to his need" is a fundamentally good idea. I probably won't post on this thread and I will not post my opinion. Go ahead, state your opinion along with an argument. Be sure to see both sides!
EDIT: the reason I didn't say my opinion because I didn't want to influence a "not sure" person. Whenever I am in group projects in school and another kid doesn't pull his weight, I get angry. I am a communist at heart, so I would love to see this work. I think this is really obvious; it works like taxes. Bill Gates clearly should pay more than and middle class person because he has more to give. I, a wood chopper down person, am extremely stupid. All I can do is cut wood. Somebody else though, a scientist of some sort who is truly a genius, can do almost anything. In this society, I will be "payed" the same as the scientist. If you think this is unfair, it wasn't my fault I was stupid, so how could it be fair that he gets payed more and has a better lifestyle?
Goodbye for now, if I don't respond to you, I am probably sleeping.

The quote is from Karl Marx, one of the main influences of the communist movements of the 1900’s…

I voted “strongly disagree”. I don’t believe someone “dumb” ,as you put it, deserves to make the same wages as someone as a higher mental caliper. Obviously, the smart person has more to offer for society imo and deserves all he makes.

And yes, I just spewed some words. I’m an American, therefore I think “Commies Suck! lolz0rz”
